topbar.title: About Skilline
topbar.description: We are a dedicated team of experienced engineers specializing in AI-driven systems and delivering impactful results. With a proven track record of guiding businesses to success, including contributions to companies valued over $100 million, we bring extensive cultural insights and deep industry expertise to every project, both nationally and internationally.

successtitle.title: Success stories
successtitle.description: Skilline revolutionizes Bharat's education with affordable, AI-driven, job-guaranteed courses in technology and high-demand sectors, empowering learners and fostering national skill development.

stories.title: Maharaju
stories.description: He is previously in data entry at Genpact, tripled his salary within a year after our offline training and is now a skilled React developer at XULifestyle

stories.title: Kishore
stories.description: He had a 2-year gap post-graduation and worked in operations. Our offline training equipped him with programming skills, and he now excels at Mindmaster Singapore.

stories.title: Sonu Verma
stories.description: He is the son of a laborer, couldn't finish his bachelorâ€™s degree. After our offline training, he became a full-stack developer, creating top-tier document processing modules.

stories.title: Dilip Vishwakarma
stories.description: He had limited opportunities and worked with outdated technology. Our offline training upskilled him, making him one of the industry's top talents.

stories.title: Deepti
stories.description: She is a housewife with a 10-year gap, gained confidence and became a proficient Python developer through our offline training program.

stories.title: Avinesh
stories.description: He had an 8-year gap and was in an operations job in Singapore. Our offline training course gave him the skills and confidence to succeed in the tech industry.

topbar.title: Team Members:
topbar.description: Our core team excels in strategic advising, portfolio building, and AI-driven solutions. With expertise spanning business, IT, data engineering, UI development, and DevOps, we drive impactful results for companies globally, leveraging deep industry knowledge and extensive cultural insights to guide businesses to success.
